Class EngineeringUtil

extends java.lang.Object

 notation.

      • convert

        public static java.lang.String convert​(double val,
                                       int dp)
         Converts a double into an 'engineering notated'
 String.
        Parameters:
        val - The value to be converted
        dp - The number of decimal places

      • parse

        public static double parse​(java.lang.String str)
         Parses an 'engineering notated' String for a
 double value.
        Parameters:
        str - The String to be parsed

      • parse

        public static double parse​(java.lang.String str,
                           int dp)
                    throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
         Parses an 'engineering notated' String for a
 double value. Strings with more decimal places
 than dp are not allowed and throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        str - The String to be parsed
        dp - The number of decimal places
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException

      • parse

                    throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
         Parses an 'engineering notated' char[] for a
 double value.
        Parameters:
        chars - The char[] to be parsed
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException
